rex_slgmovement.name: SLG movement
rex_slgmovement.description: Movement on the chess board of strategy game.

cache-cost.name: Cache cost
cache-cost.desc: Cache the cost of each tile in a request.

shuffle-neighbors.name: Shuffle neighbors
shuffle-neighbors.desc: Shuffle the order of checking neighbors.

weight.name: Weight
weight.desc: Weight of heuristic estimation for A*- path mode.

on-cost-function.description: Cost function to get cost of each tile.

on-filter-function.description: Filter function to re-assign target instances.

setup.display-text: Set board object to [i]{0}[/i], instance group object to [i]{1}[/i]
setup.description: Set board object and instance group object.

get-moveable-area.display-text: Get moveable area of chess [i]{0}[/i] by moving points to [i]{1}[/i] and cost to [i]{2}[/i], filter to [i]{3}[/i]. Then put result to group [i]{4}[/i]

moving_cost2.name: Moving cost
moving_cost2.desc: A number or a function name to get moving cost for each tile.

filter3.name: Filter
filter3.desc: Filter function name to get avaiable uid, "" is passing default.

get-moveable-area-by-uid.display-text: Get moveable area of chess UID:[i]{0}[/i] by moving points to [i]{1}[/i] and cost to [i]{2}[/i], filter to [i]{3}[/i]. Then put result to group [i]{4}[/i]

moving_cost2.name: Moving cost
moving_cost2.desc: A number or a function name to get moving cost for each tile.

filter3.name: Filter
filter3.desc: Filter function name to get avaiable uid, "" is passing default.

get-moving-path.display-text: Get moving path start from chess [i]{0}[/i] to [i]{5}[/i] tile/chess [i]{1}[/i] with moving points to [i]{2}[/i] and cost to [i]{3}[/i], then put result to group [i]{4}[/i]

moving_cost3.name: Moving cost
moving_cost3.desc: A number or a function name to get moving cost for each tile.

get-moving-path-by-uid.display-text: Get moving path start from chess UID:[i]{0}[/i] to [i]{5}[/i] tile/chess UID:[i]{1}[/i] with moving points to [i]{2}[/i] and cost to [i]{3}[/i], then put result to group [i]{4}[/i]

moving_cost3.name: Moving cost
moving_cost3.desc: A number or a function name to get moving cost for each tile.

blocking.description: Blocking property used in cost function, used in action:"Set cost". The value is (-1)

tile-x.description: Get logic X of target tile.

tile-y.description: Get logic Y of target tile.

infinity.description: Infinity property used in moving point, used in Moving point. The value is (-1)

uid-to-path-cost.description: Get path cost of chess/tile by UID. Retrun (-1) if unknown.

nearest-tile-uid.description: Get UID of nearest tile to target.

previous-tile-x.description: Get logic X of previos tile.

previous-tile-y.description: Get logic Y of previos tile.

previous-tile-path-cost.description: Get path cost of previos tile.

start-x.description: Get logic X of target position.

start-y.description: Get logic Y of start position.

end-x.description: Get logic X of end tile.

end-y.description: Get logic Y of end tile.
